citiasia.description: Developing backend RESTful API system using Laravel (PHP) and NestJS (Node.js).|Create API documentation for mobile developer team.|Developing and refactor the frontend interface of the website using Vue.js and Laravel Blade.|Working in a team with Agile/Scrum methods.

sgs.description: Create and develop SIDIA mobile app using the Vue.js and Ionic frameworks.|Create and develop Restful API system to be consumed by the SIDIA mobile app.|Used Docker and Vite.js to accelerate application development in development stage.|Working in a team with RAD (Rapid Application Development) method.
